Message.Msg: I viewed the NRA add differently --- it was am attempt (ham fisted, for sure) to point out how politicians, especially Obama, are such hypocrites and how they participate in a two-tiered social system of haves and have nots. Obama does not want guards in our schools, but ismis okay for his girl's schools (forget the secret service, I am referring tom the armed guards their schools actually hire for all the rich kids going there). Note also that despite his lip service, Obama, like most politicians, is against charter schools and school choice all while sending HIS kids to super-safe private schools. Hmmmmm.
